import{Card,CardBody,CardTitle,Container,Row,Col}from"reactstrap";class Timer extends React.Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.state={seconds:0,accidents:Math.floor(Math.random()*1000),type:"ACCIDENTS",name_view:"This Month"};}tick(){var new_name_view="";if(this.state.seconds%3==0){new_name_view="Today";}else{if(this.state.seconds%2==0){new_name_view="This Week";}else{new_name_view="This Month";}}this.setState(state=>({seconds:state.seconds+1,accidents:Math.floor(Math.random()*1000),type:state.type,name_view:new_name_view}));}componentDidMount(){this.interval=setInterval(()=>this.tick(),3000);}componentWillUnmount(){clearInterval(this.interval);}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(CardBody,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Row,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"col"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(CardTitle,{tag:"h5",className:"text-uppercase text-muted mb-0"},"Accidents"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"h2 font-weight-bold mb-0"},this.state.name_view+"\t","  :",this.state.accidents)),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Col,{className:"col-auto"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"icon icon-shape bg-danger text-white rounded-circle shadow"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("i",{className:"fas fa-chart-bar"})))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"mt-3 mb-0 text-muted text-sm"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"text-success mr-2"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("i",{className:"fa fa-arrow-up"})," 3.48%")," ",/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"text-nowrap"},"Since last month")));}}export default Timer;
